title: ArmFormer: Lightweight Transformer Architecture for Real-Time Multi-Class Weapon Segmentation and Classification
summary: The escalating threat of weapon-related violence necessitates automated detection systems capable of pixel-level precision for accurate threat assessment in real-time security applications. Traditional weapon detection approaches rely on object detection frameworks that provide only coarse bounding box localizations, lacking the fine-grained segmentation required for comprehensive threat analysis.
